attributes.action: Ban the production and sales of all Rawhide products across the UK.
attributes.additional_details: This is a must for the Government to implement and rawhide causes so many problems for dogs, additionally, people don’t even know how dangerous these dog ‘treats’ are. Hundreds of dogs die each year due to Rawhide. Rawhide causes an increase of risk of choking hazard, they are often contaminated with chemicals such as glue to put them together, bacteria and diseases such as salmonella and cause bowel obstruction. These result in serious surgery needed and in a lot of cases, your pet dying.
attributes.background: I want stricter laws for the sale of rawhide products. They should be completely banned for production and sale across the uk.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Ban the sale of all rawhide products for pets
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/708014
